body:
@bradfitz @minux 
You want to tell me that it is the correct way for gofmt and goimports to hang if the canonical path does not match the the path inside $GOPATH/src folder?

They either should ignore the `// import ""` section or should fail with a message.
I prefer them to ignore since they are not building anything.

I am not fighting vanity imports but trying to use them to fix the packaging problems of go (and that could be well done, if... see other ticket).
